item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, December 10, 2024 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Memory-safe PNG decoders now vastly outperform C PNG libraries (69 points | 12 comments)

3. Filesystems can tell the kernel to panic (10 points | 4 comments)

10. The Shepherd 1.0.0 released: the init system written in Scheme (58 points | 6 comments)
11. What are your favorite non-standard CLI utilities/applications (3 points | 5 comments)
12. Lobelia URL State Codecs: for encoding arbitrary state trees into URL parameters and back again (2 points | 1 comment)
13. From where I left (3 points | no comments)
14. An experimental (e)shell pager (10 points | no comments)
15. How to Think About Time (39 points | 11 comments)
16. Rust Futures are not guaranteed to be lazy (14 points | 12 comments)
17. Building a Tiny CDN With pyinfra and Chimera Linux (16 points | no comments)

21. TCC and the macOS Platform Sandbox Policy (6 points | 1 comment)
22. Compromising OpenWrt Supply Chain via Truncated SHA-256 Collision and Command Injection (44 points | 4 comments)
23. C has its limits. If you know where to look (9 points | 1 comment)
24. Douglas Crockford Is Not Your Dad (67 points | 88 comments)
25. Apple’s use of Swift and SwiftUI in iOS 18 (13 points | no comments)
